ROOT.GetTNodeInfo: select n.id,n.name,n.line_id,n.owner,n.running_state,n.tower_id,t.longitude,t.latitude,l.voltage_type from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_tnode_b n left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b l on n.line_id=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t on n.tower_id= t.id where t.longitude is not null
ROOT.GetTLineTower: select b.ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,a.Tower_Name as TowerName,0 AS VOLTAGE,a.TLINE_ID AS LINEID,a.OWNER,b.type from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tline_r_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID
ROOT.GetTLineTowerInfoById: select a.tower_id as ID,a.TOWERNO AS TOWERNUM ,B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE,a.owner,a.tower_name as towername,b.type from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tline_r_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b b on a.TOWER_ID = b.ID WHERE tline_id = '{0}'
